name: 'Arrival/Departure' EP + T-Shirt

Shirt sizes: S, M, L

name: 'Arrival/Departure' EP
description:
Recorded in January 2011, the 'Arrival/Departure' EP is our first release since we signed to Birmingham indie 'Incremental Music'. Recorded at Angelic Studios by Iain Gore (Starsailor, Coldplay) and mastered by Tim Turan, this physical copy features:

1. Mind Games
2. Escape Plan
3. New York Smile

And as a little bonus for getting your hands on a limited physical copy, we've thrown in a few audible extras:

4. Birth [Bonus Track]
5. Turbulence (Parisian Cowboy Remix) [Bonus Track]

The EP will be available to buy online very soon!
